title: BRIEF-Vanda Pharmaceuticals Qtrly Net Loss Per Share $0.04
text: February 14, 2018 / 9:27 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Vanda Pharmaceuticals Qtrly Net Loss Per Share $0.04 Reuters Staff Feb 14 (Reuters) - Vanda Pharmaceuticals Inc: * VANDA PHARMACEUTICALS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER 2017 AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * ‍NON-GAAP NET INCOME FOR Q4 OF 2017, WAS $0.03 PER SHARE​ * QTRLY TOTAL REVENUES $44.3 MILLION VERSUS $38.2 MILLION * ‍FULL YEAR 2018 FINANCIAL OBJECTIVES INCLUDES YEAR-END 2018 CASH $115 MILLION TO $125 MILLION​ * QTRLY NET LOSS PER SHARE $0.04 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.12, REVENUE VIEW $43.5 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
